name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Manual QA Engineer with a robust background in manual and automated testing, bringing over 10 years of experience in delivering high-quality software solutions, particularly in fintech and iGaming sectors. Expertise in testing methodologies including manual testing, API testing, and website testing, utilizing tools such as **BrowserStack**, **Sentry**, **Grafana**, and **Kibana** for effective quality assurance and monitoring. Proficient in client-server architecture, ensuring adherence to performance and security standards through thorough testing strategies. Skilled in network technologies like **TCP/IP**, **VPN**, and **DNS** to assure reliable application performance.

Experienced with Agile development frameworks, leveraging tools such as **Jira** and **Confluence** for project management, and CI/CD practices with **GitLab** to maintain a smooth development lifecycle. Adept at implementing test design techniques to create comprehensive test cases and executing them efficiently. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills complemented by a passion for driving impactful results through high-quality products.
